channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Common Docker
item.description: 常見docker指令 Image list images docker images pull images docker pull debian pull an image by digest docker pull ubuntu:20.04 pull from a different registry docker pull myregistry.local:5000/testing/test-image remove images docker rmi [IMAGE_ID] Continer run container at backgroud docker run -d --restart=always --network=host debian list container docker ps execute an interactive shell # --interactive , -i Keep STDIN open even if not # --tty , -t Allocate a pseudo-TTY docker exec -it [CONTAINER_ID] [bash/sh] Stop a container docker stop [CONTAINER_ID] # --time , -t Seconds to wait for stop before killing it, default=10 docker stop -t 30 [CONTAINER_ID]

item.title: Common Curl
item.description: 常見curl指令 POST application/json curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/data \ -d '{"key1":"value1", "key2":"value2"}' \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" form data curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/data \ -H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" \ -d "key1=value1&key2=value2" with a data fail curl -d "@data.json" -X POST http://localhost:3000/data

item.title: Install Vim Fail
item.description: 問題描述 在nginx/1.14.2的docker images安裝vim時跳出下列Error apt-get install vim Reading package lists... Done Building dependency tree Reading state information... Done The following packages were automatically installed and are no longer required: libreadline7 readline-common Use 'apt autoremove' to remove them. The following additional packages will be installed: libgpm2 vim-common vim-runtime xxd Suggested packages: gpm ctags vim-doc vim-scripts The following NEW packages will be installed: libgpm2 vim vim-common vim-runtime xxd 0 upgraded, 5 newly installed, 0 to remove and 4 not upgraded.

item.title: SSL Handshake Issue
item.description: 問題描述 廠商換了一家新的CDN廠商後，發現原本Nginx Reverse Proxy的Request都會回502，並從Nginx log可以找到以下Error 2022/09/22 02:39:06 [warn] 248#248: *65138446 upstream server temporarily disabled while SSL handshaking to upstream, client: 10.XXX.XXX.XXX, server: self.backend.com, request: "GET / HTTP/1.1", upstream: "https://10.YYY.YYY.YYY:443/", host: "self.backend.com" 2022/09/22 02:39:06 [error] 248#248: *65138446 SSL_do_handshake() failed (SSL: error:14094438:SSL routines:ssl3_read_bytes:tlsv1 alert internal error:SSL alert number 80) while SSL handshaking to upstream, client: 10.XXX.XXX.XXX, server: self.backend.com, request: "GET / HTTP/1.1", upstream: "https://10.YYY.YYY.YYY:443/", host: "self.backend.com" 2022/09/22 02:39:06 [warn] 248#248: *65138446 upstream server temporarily disabled while SSL handshaking to upstream, client: 10.
